job.title: Machine Learning Engineer (NLP)

and psychiatrists who work as a team to deliver personalized care right through your smartphonenbspThe Ginger app provides members with access to the support they need within seconds 247 365 days a by Fast Company as one of the Most Innovative Companies in HealthcarenbspppbrppstrongAbout the rolestrongppWe are looking for an outstanding candidate who has worked in machine learning and is content eg modules in the app based on a range of featuresliliIntegrate streaming activity and sleep data directly from the phone or via services to expand our capacity to provide meaningful insight
